definition: system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]

sentences.english: Let your focus be on guiding your children to develop actual discipline.
sentences.chinese: 讓你的重點落在指導孩子形成真正的紀律自制上來。

sentences.english: The foam concrete block was prepared by self-made compound protein foam agent.
sentences.chinese: 以自制複合型蛋白質爲發泡劑，製備泡沫混凝土砌塊。

sentences.english: A hardware-in-the-loop test bench was developed and was applied in debugging the algorithms that had been mentioned previously.
sentences.chinese: 應用自制的硬件在環試驗平臺對上述算法進行了調試。

sentences.english: Objective To introduce the therapy of epiphora symptoms with self-produced internal tube.
sentences.chinese: 目的介紹溢淚症的自制內涵管置入治療。

sentences.english: Ms. Yeoman also sells self-illustrated greeting cards.
sentences.chinese: 除此之外，雅曼女士還銷售自制的問候卡片。

sentences.english: In the market for a home-made guitar pick or a mini canvas brooch?
sentences.chinese: 你正在搜尋自制吉他撥片或迷你帆布胸針？

sentences.english: You can make one for cheap.
sentences.chinese: 你可以自制一個反光板或柔光罩，很便宜。

sentences.english: Eg: Application of the hoisting jack made by ourself in install of large colliery equipment.
sentences.chinese: 自制千斤頂在煤礦大型設備安裝中的使用。

sentences.english: A static cultivation apparatus for the culture in vitro of Plasmodium falciparum gametocytes is described.
sentences.chinese: 應用自制恆溫恆氣裝置靜態培養惡性瘧原蟲配子體。

sentences.english: To observe clinical observation on the treatment of tinea versicolor with Quxuan medicinal liquor.
sentences.chinese: 觀察自制中藥祛癬方治療花斑癬的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: The apparatus and the bubble solution are made in the laboratory of BUIST.
sentences.chinese: 氦氣泡發生器，低速發生頭和發泡液由我們自制。

sentences.english: Power of self-restraint, cool-headed , hope and confidence.
sentences.chinese: 自制的力量，冷靜的頭腦，希望和信心。

sentences.english: Layered with home-cooked mocha and lots of crunchy Californian walnuts.
sentences.chinese: 蛋糕中夾着一層層自制的摩卡和鮮脆的加州核桃。

sentences.english: She brought me a bottle of home made fermented brown rice.
sentences.chinese: 她給我一瓶自制糙米甜酒釀。

sentences.english: The self-made cervical vertebral fusion cage has good biocompatibility.
sentences.chinese: 自制頸椎融合器有較好的生物相容性。

sentences.english: HaWe you ever tried homemade ice cream?
sentences.chinese: 你有喫過自制的冰淇淋嗎？

definition: to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
to do (sth) oneself/to help oneself to
course of study/teaching module at university/tutorial
